summary: A suite of automated tests that validate the functionality of an image handling library, covering error detection, malformed input handling, region extraction, multi‑threaded and multi‑slide processing, whole‑image loading, color format support, resolution conversion, and integration with data loading pipelines.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and accuracy of the image processing components used in medical or scientific imaging workflows, thereby reducing risk of data corruption and ensuring reliable inputs for analysis and machine‑learning models.
